title: Darnell
desc: Pico's best friend, arsonist at large. He lives entirely off-grid, same as Pico, but has his own gig as an underground demolitionist, as he calls it. It's basically just arson. Job title isn't ENTIRELY wrong. He's one sarcastic, smug son of a bitch that loves to push buttons for his own enjoyment. He seems to be going kind of overboard lately, though. And whats with that new outfit...?

cData.desc: Scrapped Promo Art for Weekend 1 by FifLeo
Weekend 1 Darnell Design Concept by DastardlyDeacon
Weekend 1 Darnell Old Style Sprite by FifLeo
